member.name: IPV6_ADDRESS_EX
member.summary: The IPV6_ADDRESS_EX structure stores an IPv6 address.

member.name: IPV6_ADDRESS_EX.sin6_port
member.summary: The IPv6 port number in network byte order.

member.name: IPV6_ADDRESS_EX.sin6_flowinfo
member.summary: The IPv6 flowinfo value from the IPv6 header in network byte order.

member.name: IPV6_ADDRESS_EX.sin6_addr
member.summary: The IPv6 address in network byte order.

member.name: IPV6_ADDRESS_EX.sin6_scope_id
member.summary: The IPv6 scope ID in network byte order.
